overview: A sport like football is primarily a passionate celebration, but one that is so massive (economically, politically and socially) that it, of course, also brings many problems. Olallo Rubio's third documentary (and fourth film in total), Ilusi칩n Nacional, is a take on how the world's most popular sport relates to Mexican society and politics.
tagline: In every defeat there is a victory.
title: Ilusi칩n Nacional
